title: conferred on me by section 13(3) of the Finance (Local Property Tax) Act 2012
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Finance (Local Property Tax) Act 2012
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Finance (Local Property Tax) Act 2012 

(Section 13(3)) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited finance (local property tax) act 2012 (section 13(3)) order 2020

title: conferred on me by section 13(3) of the Finance (Local Property Tax) Act 2012
heading: In this Order, “2019 Order” means the Finance (Local Property Tax) Act
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “2019 Order” means the Finance (Local Property Tax) Act 

2012 (Section 13(3)) Order 2019 (S.I. No.166 of 2019).
text_norm: 2 order 2019 order mean finance (local property tax) act 2012 (section 13(3)) order 2019 (s.i no.166 2019)

title: conferred on me by section 13(3) of the Finance (Local Property Tax) Act 2012
heading: 3. The valuation date referred to in subsection (2) of section 13 of the
text_raw:
3. The valuation date referred to in subsection (2) of section 13 of the 
Finance (Local Property Tax) Act 2012 (No.52 of 2012) is altered by the 
substitution of the following paragraphs for paragraphs (a) and (b) (as last altered 
by the 2019 Order) of that subsection: 

(a) 1 May 2013 for the years 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 

2019, 2020 and 2021, and 

(b) 

for each consecutive 3-year period after the year 2021, 1 
November in the year preceding the first year of the particular 3 
year period.”.
text_norm: 3 valuation date referred subsection (2) section 13 finance (local property tax) act 2012 (no.52 2012) altered substitution following paragraph paragraph (a) (b) (as last altered 2019 order) subsection (a) 1 may 2013 year 2013 2014 2015 2016 2017 2018 2019 2020 2021 (b) consecutive 3-year period year 2021 1 november year preceding first year particular 3 year period

title: conferred on me by section 13(3) of the Finance (Local Property Tax) Act 2012
heading: 4. The 2019 Order is revoked
text_raw:
4. The 2019 Order is revoked 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 October, 2020. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 27th October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [ ] 3
text_norm: 4 2019 order revoked given official seal 22 october 2020 paschal donohoe minister finance notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 27th october 2020 3

title: conferred on me by section 13(3) of the Finance (Local Property Tax) Act 2012
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order defers the revaluation date for the local property tax from 1 
November 2020 to 1 November 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [ ]
